game.name: KOBOLOK
game.shortDescription: KOBOLOK is an ethnic PS1 style horror game based on an Eastern European fairytale about round bread "Kolobok" aka "O Koblížkovi" aka "Pannkauken".
game.shortDescriptionEn: KOBOLOK is an ethnic PS1 style horror game based on an Eastern European fairytale about round bread "Kolobok" aka "O Koblížkovi" aka "Pannkauken".

reviewHighlights.text: This game is short, boring and has the world's worst mouse sens that can't be adjusted. It took me only 30 minutes to get both the endings. The story...
